subject: Asking
body:
Good Day

We have been trying to reach out to you regarding estate funds deposited
with our bank. Our ancestry search chooses you to be the nearest
beneficiary to the estate funds. Kindly reply back to this email for
further details: *mrrebenham5@gmail.com <mrrebenham5@gmail.com>*

Mr. Ruben Abraham

subject: Re: Asking
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this is quite surprising! I never knew I had any connection to an estate fund. Could you please provide me with more details about this? Like, how did your ancestry search lead to me? And who exactly is Mr. Ruben Abraham?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerome

subject: Re: Asking
body:
Hello there,

Wow, this is quite surprising! I never knew I had any connection to an estate. Could you please tell me more about this? How did you find my connection to Mr. Ruben Abraham's estate?

Best wishes,
Jerome
